channel.title: Auxy reposting account
channel.description: There's a lot of people who are talented producers but are getting insufficient views per song. I think that somebody with the time to run a reposting account should create one. Then once it gets enough followers many artists will have their tracks promoted for free. This can be helpful because I've noticed that the more views I get on a track the more confident I am. Everyone deserves to have that feeling.

item.description:
I am really hoping by Lush Records, we can hear more of these amazing Auxy producers

item.title: Auxy reposting account
item.dc:creator: J_Cort
item.description:
There’s a lot of people who are talented producers but are getting insufficient views per song. I think that somebody with the time to run a reposting account should create one. Then once it gets enough followers many artists will have their tracks promoted for free. This can be helpful because I’ve noticed that the more views I get on a track the more confident I am. Everyone deserves to have that feeling.
